fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, visit a player to check up on their guard dog
- At night, check up on your own guard dog (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players who’s guard dogs you check up on will gain a powerful autovest if they’re town.
- If your target is evil, their guard dog will bite you and you die.
- If your target is a neutral who cannot kill in any way, their guard dog won’t be a guard dog but instead a little dachshund, and you learn this.
- If your target is a kill-capable neutral role, their guard dog will instead be a gremlin chihuahua and your target will be told your identity
